casebody.data:
SUPREME COURT, et al.
v.
Billy LAND. No. 178P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2007. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of April 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of April 2007."
